scripts.build: next build && npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs
scripts.migration:create:local: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:create
scripts.migration:generate:local: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run:local: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert:local: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:show:local: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:show -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:generate:prod: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run:prod: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert:prod: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d dist/data-source.js
scripts.migration:show:prod: npm run build:ts && node ./scripts/fix-dist-imports.mjs && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:show -d dist/data-source.js
